<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.LFSettingsFactoryService</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Utility class to handle the settings used in localization framework & hub. Customers are not expected to override these core functions.</description>
        <name>LFSettingsFactoryService</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var LFSettingsFactoryService = Class.create();
LFSettingsFactoryService.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    type: 'LFSettingsFactoryService'
};

LFSettingsFactoryService.validateSettings = function(artifactInternalName, targetLanguages, additionalInfo) {
    var lfConstants = new LFConstants();
    if (artifactInternalName == lfConstants.TRANSLATION_ITEM_ARTIFACT) {
        if (!GlidePluginManager.isActive(lfConstants.LOCALIZATION_FRAMEWORK_HUB_PLUGIN_ID)) {
            new LFExceptionMapper('LOCALIZATION_FRAMEWORK_HUB_PLUGIN_NOT_INSTALLED').throwException();
        }
        var validationUtils = new sn_lf_hub.ValidationUtils();
        validationUtils.isSpokeSettingsNameAvailable(additionalInfo);
        validationUtils.validateSpokeSettings(additionalInfo.spokeSettingsName);
    } else {
        new LFValidationUtils().validateTargetLanguageCodeSetting(artifactInternalName, targetLanguages);
    }
};

LFSettingsFactoryService.getSettings = function(artifactInternalName, targetLanguageSysId, additionalInfo) {
    var lfConstants = new LFConstants();
    if (artifactInternalName == lfConstants.TRANSLATION_ITEM_ARTIFACT) {
        if (!GlidePluginManager.isActive(lfConstants.LOCALIZATION_FRAMEWORK_HUB_PLUGIN_ID)) {
            new LFExceptionMapper('LOCALIZATION_FRAMEWORK_HUB_PLUGIN_NOT_INSTALLED').throwException();
        }
        return new sn_lf_hub.SpokeSettingUtils(additionalInfo.spokeSettingsName).getSettings();
    } else {
        return new LFSettingUtils().getLFSetting(artifactInternalName, targetLanguageSysId);
    }
};]]></script>
